languages.text: {n}Холод и необъяснимая тяжесть витают в воздухе. Все ваше нутро кричит — нужно бежать. Скорее. Прямо сейчас!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Холод и необъяснимая тяжесть витают в воздухе. Все ваше нутро кричит — нужно бежать. Скорее. Прямо сейчас!{/n}

languages.text: {n}Frigid heaviness hangs in the air. Your entire being implores you to run. Quickly. Now!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Холод и необъяснимая тяжесть витают в воздухе. Все ваше нутро кричит — нужно бежать. Скорее. Прямо сейчас!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The air is thick with cold and an inexplicable heaviness. Your entire being implores you to run. Quickly. Now!{/n}
{n}The air is thick with cold and an inexplicable heaviness. Your entire being implores you to run. Quickly. Now!{/n}
{n}The air is thick with cold and an inexplicable heaviness. Your entire being implores you to run. Quickly. Now!{/n}
{n}The air is thick with cold and an inexplicable heaviness. Your entire being implores you to run. Quickly. Now!{/n}
{n}Frigid heaviness hangs in the air. Your entire being implores you to run. Quickly. Now!{/n}
{n}Frigid heaviness hangs in the air. Your entire being implores you to run. Quickly. Now!{/n}

languages.text: {n}凍てつく重苦しさが空気に漂う。あなたの全身が「走れ」と懇願する。早く。今すぐ！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Frigid heaviness hangs in the air. Your entire being implores you to run. Quickly. Now!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}凍てつく重苦しさが空気に漂う。あなたの全身が「走れ」と懇願する。早く。今すぐ！{/n}

languages.text: {n}空气变得冰冷，沉重无比。你的整个生命都在恳求你赶紧逃跑。快跑！别再磨蹭了！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Frigid heaviness hangs in the air. Your entire being implores you to run. Quickly. Now!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}空气变得冰冷，充斥着说不出的沉重。你所有的直觉都在恳求你赶紧逃跑。快跑！别再磨蹭了！{/n}

languages.text: {n}El aire se impregna de una pesadez gélida. Todo tu ser te implora que corras. Deprisa. ¡Ahora!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Frigid heaviness hangs in the air. Your entire being implores you to run. Quickly. Now!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El aire se impregna de una pesadez gélida. Todo tu ser te implora que corras. Deprisa. ¡Ahora!{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine eisige Schwere liegt in der Luft. Dein gesamtes Wesen fleht dich an, zu fliehen. Schnell. Sofort!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Frigid heaviness hangs in the air. Your entire being implores you to run. Quickly. Now!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In der Luft hängt eine kalte, unerklärliche Schwere. Dein gesamtes Wesen fleht dich an, zu fliehen. Schnell. Sofort!{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'air devient pesant et glacial. Votre raison vous implore de prendre la fuite. Faites vite. Allez !{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Frigid heaviness hangs in the air. Your entire being implores you to run. Quickly. Now!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Inexplicablement, l'air se fait de plus en plus lourd, et de plus en plus froid. Votre raison vous implore de prendre la fuite. Vite. Maintenant !{/n}

languages.text: {n}Havayı ağır bir soğukluk sarıyor. Tüm varlığınla koşman gerektiğini hissediyorsun. Acele et. Hemen!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Frigid heaviness hangs in the air. Your entire being implores you to run. Quickly. Now!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Havayı ağır bir soğukluk sarıyor. Tüm varlığınla koşman gerektiğini hissediyorsun. Acele et. Hemen!{/n}
